attributes.action: Self-Confidence, Assertiveness & Team-building in National Curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Self-confidence and the ability to assert oneself appears to be one of the key areas with which all children struggle on passing from one level of education to the next and/or onwards into the world of work.  There must be an educational course in these subjects together with team building included within the National Curriculum.  This can make the difference between getting a place in the university of their choice, or the job for which they are really capable but lack the confidence to speak up for themselves in the correct way at an interview.
